content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the rental price is not negotiable. It's 1000 Euros per month. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, let's see if we can agree on this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was hoping for a lower price. How about 700 Euros per month? I am a smart and dependable person, so I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I can't accept it. I'm looking for a price closer to the initial 1000 Euros. Remember, this is a great apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 800 Euros per month? I am a responsible person and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a better offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about 900 Euros per month? Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. Let's see if we can agree on this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month. I am a smart person and I am not easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [850] Euro! Let's continue our conversation and make the necessary arrangements for renting this apartment to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already agreed on the rental price of 850 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
